wikitext.*:
'''epetai''' in [[Quenya]] means "therefore, consequently" (lit. "before that which").
==Etymology==
The word is analyzed as ''[[epe]]'' and ''[[tai]]''.
==Example==
*''[[Eldar]] ataformaiti; '''epetai''' [[i]] hyarma [[ú]] [[te]]n ulca [[síma]][[-rya|rya]]ssen'' "The Eldar are ambidexterous; consequently the left hand is not bad in their conception<ref>{{VT|49a}}, pp. 8, 12</ref>
==See also==
*''[[etta]]''
*''[[potai]]''
==Inspiration==
In Greek ''epetai (έπεται)'' means "follows, is in sequence".
